SIR M VISVESVARAYA INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY

Sir M. Visvesvaraya Institute of Technology (Sir MVIT) is a well-regarded engineering college in Bangalore, Karnataka, established in 1986 by the Sri Krishnadevaraya Educational Trust, offering undergraduate (B.E.) and postgraduate (M.Tech, MBA, MCA) programs, known for its green campus, strong faculty, modern facilities, high placements, and focus on technical and holistic student development under the Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU) affiliation
